questions.question: In which region of Albania would you prefer to study?

options.answer: Tirana or Durres
Southern Albania (e.g., Vlora, Gjirokastra)
Northern Albania (e.g., Shkodra, Kukës)
No preference

questions.question: How important is low tuition or free education to you?

options.answer: Very important – I need free or very low-cost education
Somewhat important – I can afford some fees
Not important – I can afford private tuition

questions.question: Are you open to moving away from home for university?

options.answer: Yes, anywhere in Albania
Only within commuting distance
Only in my city or very close

questions.question: How do you plan to pay for your studies?

options.answer: I’ll need scholarships or financial aid
My family will cover the costs
I plan to work part-time

questions.question: Do you prefer studying in Albanian or English?

options.answer: Albanian
English
Either works for me

questions.question: What type of student lifestyle are you looking for?

options.answer: Active campus life with clubs and events
Calm and focused learning environment
Flexible – I want time for work or family

questions.question: How important is job placement after graduation?

options.answer: Very important – I want internships and job support
Moderately important – I want to enjoy my field too
Not important – I’ll create my own path

questions.question: How involved are your parents in your university decision?

options.answer: Very involved – they will influence my decision
Somewhat involved – they’ll support my choice
Not involved – it’s fully my decision

questions.question: Would you consider studying at a private university in Albania?

options.answer: Yes – if the program is right
No – only public universities
Not sure – depends on scholarships

questions.question: Do you want to live in a dorm, rent an apartment, or stay at home?

options.answer: Stay at home
Live in a dorm or student residence
Rent alone or with friends

questions.question: Do you want a program that offers internships during your studies?

options.answer: Yes – experience is a priority
Not necessarily – I prefer academic theory

questions.question: Are you planning to study for a Master’s degree after your Bachelor's?

options.answer: Yes, definitely
Maybe – depends on the job market
No – I want to work immediately

questions.question: What kind of program schedule do you prefer?

options.answer: Traditional full-time (morning/afternoon classes)
Flexible or part-time (evening or weekend options)
Online or hybrid options

questions.question: Do you prefer universities known for a specific field?

options.answer: Yes – I want the best school for my chosen field
No – I want a balanced university with many options
